formattedAddress: 40 E 9th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 40 E 9th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Tried scamming us $50 saying that SpotHero wasn't accepted yet they took the car and accepted the reservation before.

text.text: Tried scamming us $50 saying that SpotHero wasn't accepted yet they took the car and accepted the reservation before.

originalText.text: Predatory garage with no transparency. I used spothero to book a spot for 30 days and the attendants forced an additional application for $30 on me. Low-and-behold, they have in the fine print (a contract that has yet to be relayed to me) that they will bill you mid-month for the following month at an increased. The attendant explicitly told me I'd only be charged if I left my car there at the end of my Spothero reservation. Their corporate office could not be more rude over the phone. Horrible garage

originalText.text: Been parking here monthly for 2 years.  The guys are great. However, after buying a new car, parked here for 1-week, the first time I went to pick it up the front fender was totally scraped/scratched.  2 weeks after chasing management down the told me the "manager" said he fixed it, showed my wife, and she was ok.  After speaking to my wife, she confirmed this was a LIE.  Upon confronting management with this LIE, I have gotten no reply.  I love the guys, but cannot trust this company any longer.  I will try to have them recruited wherever I end up.  I hope the management company fails, miserably.  Zero integrity.  Zero ethics, and they think people will trust them with one of their most valuable assets?  Not a chance.

originalText.text: Worst parking garage ever.  I selected this parking garage because it was cheap compared to the other ones but the service here is horrible.  I arrived 15 minutes early on a Friday afternoon to park.  The place was literally empty and was told to get out and come back later.  I was shocked because I have never been treated like this.  I usually tip very generous because I like to be treated well.  The parking attendant was rude and unforgiving.  He refused to accommodate and acted like he was a god.  Well, this is absolutely the last time I’m using this garage and I hope the owner understand how this one person is adversely affecting the business.

originalText.text: I trusted this garage to care for my vehicle while I had a monthly parking plan.  I had received my vehicle in return with specks of paint on my car. I had also received my vehicle with stains, spots and crackled marks from the decaying plaster in the garage.  Additionally, having seen leaves caught in the space behind the hood made me question where are they parking my vehicle. I had requested to be reimbursed for having my paint to be cleaned and repaired and they lie claiming they cleaned my vehicle. They did no such thing. Such liars. I drove off with my vehicle looking a mess.  Be aware of this garage and do not park here if you have a nice car and care about it.  Stay away. The people who work in the main office are rude as well.
